message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. I'm willing to give you a decent share. Accept this offer and we can end the game.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think we can do better. I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor.  This takes into account the fact that the money will be worth slightly less in the next round.  Let's reach a fair agreement and end this game.
That's a bit too generous, Bob. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but 55/45 is too skewed in your favor. I'll make a new offer.
